title: 15-s50iap15-th.jpg
description: An artistic rendering of a Texas Hold'em game from a player's point of view. Courtesy of Peter Hopper on Flickr. License CC BY-NC.

image_metadata.caption: A Texas Hold'em game from a player's point of view. (Courtesy of [Peter Hopper](https://www.flickr.com/photos/whisperwolf/3773334278) on Flickr. License CC BY-NC.)

image_metadata.image-alt: A hand of Texas Hold'em poker from the point of view of a player holding an ace high straight flush.
